description:
In this task, you are required to fork the Mifos Payment Gateway repository, to your github account. Then, clone it to your computer and setup your local environment. Before running the application, make sure you checkout the development branch of the project. Then go ahead to test it. You can test the application using Postman(http client)
Proof of Completion: Send in snapshots of your testing screens.
Mifos Payment Gateway Repo: https://github.com/vladimirfomene/mifos-payment-gateway/tree/development
Guidelines for testing the app: https://gist.github.com/vladimirfomene/37bd38a289d0e9a0570b132735002868
name: Fork Mifos Payment Gateway and test it.
